column4: My update to 8.04 from 7.10 is hanging at "setting up libuuid1 (1.40.8-2ubuntu2) .... could not connect to database" What can I do? Is it possible to stop the update and then restart it?
Btw it's the server edition, if that changes anything.
I'm pretty sure I can just restart the computer and when it starts up again I'm going to have to sudo dpkg-something but I'm not sure.
So does anyone know if restarting the computer halfway through the update will mess it up completely? It's hanging and I can't think of any other option.
